page.title: 07MEDIA FORRES EAST
page.content: Media in our block has its main outlet in newspapers.These are sold through the East End Post Office.The papers they sell include the Daily Mail the Daily Record and the Daily Express.The main paper is the Gazette.They also sell weekend papers like the Northern Scott and the Sunday Post.They also supply national papers.They deliver to around sixty homes.The favourite articles are advertisments for selling things like cars,computers,bicycles toys.They also sell furniture,fridges and they are also articles about selling a house.Front headlines are sometimes intresting espesialy when there are lots of exciting things happening like RAF planes flying low overhead.Other media information is available in the library.
